summary: Replaces the shout Whirlwind Sprint, Wuld Nah Kest, with audio from My Little Pony: FiM
descriptionHtml:
This was originally going to be the third mod I made, funny how easy it was to get distracted so this ended up being mod number five.

Wuld - Dash
Wuld Nah - Rainbow Dash
Wuld Nah Kest - Rainbow Dash *boom*


[url=http://youtu.be/TFhYHAlhW9Q]The shout in action[/url]


I was surprised when I noticed the delay between the boom and \"Rainbow Dash\" for the third level but the timing was so perfect I couldn\'t bring myself to change it.

To install either use the extremely handy Nexus manager or extract the file in the Data folder wherever you installed the game. By default the path is
C::\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

In the spirit of shameless self promotion, here\'s the other other mod I have uploaded so far.
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3732]Fus Ro Yay[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3783]Fluttershy loves Animal Allegiance[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3985]Trollestia Commands you to Catch on Fire[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4902]LUNA SHOUTS AT TIME AND IT OBEYS[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5981]Timber Wolves are a Howlin\'[/url]

All audio is taken from My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic
author: Snowraptor
